definition: Journey to the West, Ming dynasty novel by Wu Cheng'en 吳承恩|吴承恩, one of the Four Classic Novels of Chinese literature/also called Pilgrimage to the West or Monkey
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
west
to walk/to tour/to roam/to travel
to record/to note/to memorize/to remember/mark/sign/classifier for blows, kicks, shots
one of three Ming dynasty sequels to Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记
one of three Ming dynasty sequels to Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记

sentences.english: The journey of the west consists has many characters, mostly mythical creatures.
sentences.chinese: 西遊記包括許多章節，大部分虛構的生物。

sentences.english: It was said that the writer of Journey to the West was Qiu Chuji the originator of Quanzhen denomination.
sentences.chinese: 古傳《西遊記》是全真教龍門派開創者丘處機所撰。

sentences.english: This stour describes two characters from journey to the West.
sentences.chinese: 千里眼和順風耳是《西遊記》中的兩個人物。

sentences.english: Journey to the West, Feng Mengbo Solo, Bund 3 Gallery, Shanghai, China.
sentences.chinese: 《西遊記》馮夢波個展，滬申畫廊，中國上海。

sentences.english: In the Chinese classic Journey to the West, who does Sun Wukong meet in his first challenge?
sentences.chinese: 在《西遊記》裏，孫悟空斬妖除魔的第一關遇到誰？

sentences.english: Jet:The movie is loosely based on the classic Chinese novel Journey to the West.
sentences.chinese: 這部電影是根據中國古典名著《西遊記》改編的。

sentences.english: The author thinks the theme of Pilgrims to the west is Buddhist meditation.
sentences.chinese: 本文認爲，《西遊記》的主題是佛教的“禪門心法”。

sentences.english: Li Tian Wang was Nezha's father.
sentences.chinese: 我寫西遊記中的，李天王是哪吒的父親。

sentences.english: I am planning to write a book, and I intend to entitle it The Journey Westward.
sentences.chinese: 我準備寫一本書，打算將它命名爲《西遊記》。

sentences.english: The story is based on the earliest chapters of the classic story Journey to the West.
sentences.chinese: 故事改編於中國經典名著《西遊記》的早期篇章。

sentences.english: The character, Tang Seng, is different from the real-life monk Xuanzang.
sentences.chinese: 《西遊記》裏的唐僧和真實的玄奘還是有區別的。

sentences.english: Acute response to market is the key of success for XYJ OL.
sentences.chinese: 敏銳的反應，是藍港在線推廣《西遊記》成功的關鍵。

sentences.english: "Journey to the West" has been newly researched from the perspective of of "Dan Study".
sentences.chinese: 今本《西遊記》的回目和結構顯然與“丹經”有關。
